SEARCH
Package Distributed

Class ServerApp

java.lang.Object
Distributed.ServerApp
public class ServerApp extends Object
Main class for the server side of the app, starts the server both for RMI (publishing to the registry) and for socket (creating a thread that accepts and redirects socket connections

  • Constructor Details

    • ServerApp

      public ServerApp(int port) throws RemoteException
      Throws:
      RemoteException

  • Method Details

    • execute

      public static void execute()
      Starts the server

    • removeLobby

      public void removeLobby(Lobby lobby)
      This method removes a Lobby from the list of lobbies.
      Parameters:
      lobby - the lobby to be removed

    • handler

      public void handler(Client client, String arg) throws RemoteException
      This method is invoked by the ServerImpl method handler(). It gets the client state and, according to it, it invokes other ServerApp methods to handle the client; then it update all the players' views.
      Parameters:
      client - the client who invokes the method
      arg - the input written by the client
      Throws:
      RemoteException

    • initCommand

      public void initCommand(Client client, String nickname) throws RemoteException
      This method is invoked by the method handler(Client c, String s) if the client state is INIT. It invokes the nickname checker and, if the return is positive, registers the client to the server, adding it to the list of player of the lobby; otherwise it notifies the client that the nickname is not available. If the same client is trying to reconnect itself to the game it was playing, it invokes the RMIPlayer method reconnect().
      Parameters:
      client - the client who invokes the method
      nickname - the nickname chosen by the client
      Throws:
      RemoteException

    • waitCommand

      public void waitCommand(Client client, String command) throws IOException, InterruptedException
      This method is invoked by the method handler(Client c, String s) if the client state is WAIT and if it is the owner. It handles the command written by the client, calling other methods. If the command is not correct it notifies the client.
      Parameters:
      client - the client who invokes the method
      command - the command chosen by the owner of the lobby
      Throws:
      IOException
      InterruptedException

    • playCommand

      public void playCommand(Client client, String command) throws RemoteException
      This method is invoked by the method handler(Client c, String s) if the client state is PLAY. It calls the GameController update(String s) method, passing the command chosen by the player
      Parameters:
      client - the client who invokes the method
      command - the command chosen by the player
      Throws:
      RemoteException

    • endCommand

      public void endCommand(Client client) throws RemoteException
      This method is invoked by the method handler(Client c, String s) if the client state is END. It sets the state of all the players in the lobby to WAIT, so they can decide if to play another game or to leave.
      Parameters:
      client - the client who invokes the method
      Throws:
      RemoteException

    • heartBeatService

      public static void heartBeatService()
      This method checks for disconnections for all the RMI Players

    • checkNickname

      public String checkNickname(String nickname)
      This method checks if the nickname chosen by the client is available, searching if there are other players connected to the server with the same nickname.
      Parameters:
      nickname - the nickname chosen by the client
      Returns:
      "true" if the nickname is available, "false" if it is not available, "reconnected" if the nickname is already registered and the client is trying to reconnect to the game

    • addPlayer

      public void addPlayer(Client client, RemotePlayer rp) throws RemoteException
      This method add the client and his associated remote player to the lobby. If there are no lobby opened, it opens a new lobby.
      Parameters:
      client - client to be added to a lobby
      rp - the RemotePlayer associated to the client
      Throws:
      RemoteException

    • getLobby

      public Lobby getLobby(String nickname)

    • getLobbies

      public List<Lobby> getLobbies()
